data.eml:eml: A new species of Monoliropus Mayer, 1903 (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Caprellidae) from Korean waters

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hong, Soon-Sang, Heo, Jun-Haeng, Kim, Young-Hyo (2015): A new species of Monoliropus Mayer, 1903 (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Caprellidae) from Korean waters. ZooKeys 517: 111-121, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.517.9915, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.517.9915
